title: Google pixel 4 xl many apps are not opening or responding. My friend is having the same issue.
content: Is anyone experiencing issues with their Google pixel for Excel where the app is not opening various apps are not opening or responding.   Gmail, Yahoo finance,  Google finance , Amazon, Auto trader ,The weather Network, alarm.com, and  tips and support in the settings all do not work or respond.   Want to know how to fix this or understand what's happening because the same thing is happening to my friend's phone as well.  She also owns a Google pixel.
